about_the_game:
Trimming Sails is a 3D action adventure about sailing, exploration, and dungeon-crawling!

Overview
You play as Fyre, our young protagonist thrown into the role of a hero. When monsters appear on your home island, you must take a wooden sword and shield and venture into the Lost Shrine to cleanse the monsters residing there. You emerge victorious, but learn your quest is far from over - in fact, it has just begun. Sail the sea, meet new friends, gear up, solve puzzles, and save the world!

Sail the Sea
Venture out on the open ocean to visit tropical reefs, desert islands, frozen hills, and more - over 30 islands to explore!

Meet New Friends
Find inhabited islands as you sail and make friends with the locals! Help them and they'll help you.

Gear Up
Seek out unique tools that will help you on your journey. A magic lantern lights your path and starts fires, a shovel to dig up treasure, a fishing pole to pass the time - and so much more!

Solve Puzzles
Descend into ancient shrines packed with puzzles, hiding ancient secrets!

Save the World
Find the root of the evil invading the world and save your home!
